summary: "LightView.h" is a header file for the LightView class, inheriting from HEView, in the SMG_NothingIsAll app. It defines a delegate protocol with a method to change the light view to green and properties for the delegate and current light color status.

details.comment: "LightView.h" is a header file for the LightView class, inheriting from HEView, in the SMG_NothingIsAll app. It defines a delegate protocol with a method to change the light view to green and properties for the delegate and current light color status.
